resources.string: Don\'t have an account Sign up

Last Updated: March 26, 2025

Welcome to the UCWD Leave Monitoring System. By using this System, you agree to comply with the following Terms and Conditions.

 
1. Purpose 


The UCWD Leave Monitoring System is designed to:
Track employee leaves, including sick leave, special leave, and other types.
Enable employees to apply for leave.
Provide UCWD administrators with tools to approve or decline leave requests.

 
2. Users of the System


There are two types of users:

 
UCWD Administrators – Have access to manage employee leave requests and records.

 
Employees – Can view their leave Summary and submit leave applications.

 
Each user type will have a distinct interface tailored to their role.

 
3. User Responsibilities

 
Administrators must ensure the accuracy of leave records and handle employee requests properly.

 
Employees must provide truthful leave applications and comply with UCWD policies.

 
Users must maintain the confidentiality of their login credentials and system data.

 
4. Data Collection and Privacy

 
The system will store employee leave data, which will be provided and managed by UCWD administrators.

 
The development team is only responsible for creating the system and does not collect or store data.

 
UCWD is responsible for ensuring compliance with Philippine data privacy laws.

 
5. Restrictions

 
The following activities are strictly prohibited:

 
Unauthorized access to the system or another user’s account.

 
Tampering with or falsifying leave records.

 
Any attempt to compromise the security or integrity of the system.

 
Violations may result in disciplinary action and possible legal consequences.

 
6. Liability

 
Our development team is responsible for ensuring that the system functions correctly.

 
However, UCWD is responsible for how the system is used and how data is managed.

 
Developers are not liable for any incorrect leave records due to human error or misuse of the system.

 
7. Modifications to Terms

 
These Terms and Conditions may be updated as needed.

 
Users will be notified of changes via email or other means determined by UCWD.

 
8. Governing Law

 
This agreement is governed by the laws of the Philippines, including labor regulations and data privacy laws.

 
By using the UCWD Leave Monitoring System, you acknowledge and agree to these Terms and Conditions.

 
For any inquiries, please contact (codedearstwozero@gmail.com).
